description:
A modern terminal-based client for Azure Data Explorer (Kusto)

KustoTerminal is a powerful terminal-based client for Azure Data Explorer (Kusto) that provides an intuitive interface for querying and managing your data.

Features:
- Terminal-based UI with modern interface
- Syntax highlighting for KQL (Kusto Query Language)
- Autocompletion support
- Connection management
- Query execution and results visualization
- Azure authentication integration
- Cross-platform support with .NET 8.0

Perfect for developers and data analysts who prefer working in the terminal.
